   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to AstroDART's documentation!
=====================================

Below you will find all the necessary documentation to reduce astronomical fits images. AstroDART documentation also allows to do photometry and other taks relevant to astrophotography.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   photometry
   astrophotography
   copyright
